overview: Shay Sweet is one of the very hottest young starlets of the triple-X scene these days, and she hits the screen here with a mouth-watering assortment of her sex sprite friends, all of whom are young, juicy and succulent. They're teamed with a strapping lineup of woodsmen, all of whom treat these petite young sex fiends to transgressive rounds of no-holds barred sex, driving them to panting mega-ton Ohhs. The girls respond by working the boys to volcanic climaxes and then wantonly frolicking in the proceeds. A must-see.
title: Shay's World
